analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika pīti sahagata duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho napītisahagato
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na pīti sahagataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigha

original: pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho napītisahagato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na pīti sahagataḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: napītisahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe
analyzed: na pīti sahagataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
